web_snippets: Stephen Lord has been chosen by Opera News as one of the “25 Most Powerful Names in US Opera” (one of four conductors), and is continually praised.
Stephen Lord, née Stephen Loyacano, was a very popular big band leader in New Orleans. He has three daughters, Stephanie, Jennifer, and Elizabeth.
